comments:
Using build I200405060200.

I'm normally working in my workspace in which several windows are opened (one 
for each perspective: Java, team Synchronizing and debug).

Suddenly, I wanted to open the Resources perspective to see my Java project all 
resources... but nothing happen. Trying to open another perspective has the 
same result... nothing happen at all. It seems that this functionality was 
broken...

Looking at console I got following exception trace:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 May 06, 2004 18:37:21.933
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception
Unhandled event loop exception
Reason:

!STACK 0

Close/Restart eclipse fixes the problem...
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 61186 ***
